channel.title: Reviews on Aliens in the Apple
channel.description: Recent content in Reviews on Aliens in the Apple

item.title: Book review: Mercy Triumphs
item.description: When Jana Kelly published Side by Side in 2015, I got the opportunity to review the book before it hit stores. It was great getting into the stories of Mia, Halimah, and Rania, and then to get deeper into their lives with the next book in the series, Door to Freedom.

item.title: Book review: Door to Freedom
item.description: Back in 2015, I was given the opportunity to review the book Side by Side by Jana Kelley. It was a realistic and an enjoyable read, which I was excited to hear is turning into a trilogy.
